column8: Remove the log file if it exist
Check that the config entry has been loaded
Check that we don't log to std out
Redirect the log to the log file
Check that we don't log to std out
Check that the default log level is INFO
We should have one line in the log now
The log buffer should now be empty
Check that the log file contains one row
We should not have any line in the log now as log level is info
No file should have been created as no rows was written.
